devdoc.author: Omitul Islam
devdoc.details: Uses a mapping of hashed field names to determine non-compliance

params.fieldHashes: An array of hashed field names to check for GDPR compliance

returns._0: Returns false if any field is blacklisted, true otherwise!

devdoc.title: Task 1 GDPR Compliance Validator

constructor.notice: Initializes the contract, sets the owner, and populates the blacklist with hardcoded hashes

isCompliant(bytes32[]).notice: Checks if any of the provided field hashes are blacklisted

owner().notice: The address of the contract deployer (owner)

userdoc.notice: Validates that provided hashed field names are not in the predefined blacklist
